mapping:
Provides a mapping of some of the classes in the ISO 19115 model to a GML3.1-compliant temporary proxy implementation of the schema. Designed for use with GeoSciML 3.0.0 until a GML3.2-capable implementation platform is available.
CI_Citation isp:CI_Citation isp:CI_Citation_Type isp:CI_Citation_PropertyType
CI_ResponsibleParty isp:CI_ResponsibleParty isp:CI_ResponsibleParty_Type isp:CI_ResponsibleParty_PropertyType
CI_RoleCode isp:CI_RoleCode gco:CodeListValue_Type isp:CI_RoleCode_PropertyType
DQ_Element isp:AbstractDQ_Element isp:AbstractDQ_Element_Type isp:DQ_Element_PropertyType
DQ_QuantitativeAttributeAccuracy isp:DQ_QuantitativeAttributeAccuracy isp:DQ_QuantitativeAttributeAccuracy_Type isp:DQ_QuantitativeAttributeAccuracy_PropertyType
DQ_QuantitativeResult isp:DQ_QuantitativeResult isp:DQ_QuantitativeResult_Type isp:DQ_QuantitativeResult_PropertyType
DQ_Result isp:AbstractDQ_Result isp:AbstractDQ_Result_Type isp:DQ_Result_PropertyType
DQ_ThematicAccuracy isp:AbstractDQ_ThematicAccuracy isp:AbstractDQ_ThematicAccuracy_Type isp:DQ_ThematicAccuracy_PropertyType
MD_Metadata isp:MD_Metadata isp:MD_Metadata_Type isp:MD_Metadata_PropertyType
- MD_RepresentativeFraction isp:MD_RepresentativeFraction isp:MD_RepresentativeFraction_Type isp:MD_RepresentativeFraction_PropertyType
